text: Karl-Heinz Paque (born 4 October 1956) is a German politician for the liberal Free Democratic Party (FDP) and was Minister of Finance of the federal state of Saxony-Anhalt from 2002 to 2006. ==Life and achievements== Paque was born in the West German city of Saarbrücken and studied economics and achieved his PhD in 1980. Paque entered the FDP in 1999 and was Minister of Finance in Saxony-Anhalt from 2002 to 2006. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1956 births Category:People from Saarbrücken Category:Free Democratic Party (Germany) politicians Category:Government ministers of Germany
title: Karl-Heinz Paque
